renewed-contributions.title: Drouth
renewed-contributions.note: CCE renewal record places this story in the December 1929 issue, but FictionMags does not, instead placing it in the December 1928 issue of Romance. We have not examined the issues in question. The renewal, filed in 1957, would be too late to keep a 1928 copyright active, but a separate issue renewal was filed on time for the December 1928 issue of Romance as a whole.
